channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo Github Pages
item.description: Hugo New site Get Hugo to generate a new site: hugo new site blog Let’s check it out! cd blog ls -1 archetypes config.toml content data layouts static themes Git Initialize git repo git init Theme Let’s install a theme. We will add this as a Git submodule (so that its history will be kept separate from our own code) git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke; Now we have added that repo inside our themes directory - /themes/ananke
